document_title: Gastric (stomach) bleeding: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
Stomach bleeding seriously affects health and psychology. Therefore, prevention from the beginning is really necessary. Here are some useful guidelines to keep your digestive system healthy:
Avoid smoking and drinking too much alcohol; Maintain a daily exercise routine to increase resistance and improve the immune system.; Balance reasonable rest and work time to keep your body healthy.; Limit the use of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory pain relievers. If you must use them, the patient should consult a doctor.; Maintain a balanced diet, lifestyle, and sleep, an optimistic and happy spirit, and avoid stress; Form an ideal biological clock for the body, minimizing staying up late.
Center for Gastrointestinal Endoscopy and Surgery (Tam Anh General Hospital, Ho Chi Minh City) and Department of Gastroenterology - Hepatobiliary - Pancreatic (Tam Anh General Hospital, Hanoi) are prestigious medical centers specializing in Gastroenterology, providing Advanced and effective examination and treatment services for patients with mild to severe liver problems (fatty liver, acute and chronic hepatitis, cirrhosis, liver cancer...). K Tam Anh General Hospital system brings together a team of highly specialized and experienced Internal Medicine - Surgery - Gastrointestinal Endoscopy doctors, in addition to the support of a modern medical equipment system imported from abroad, serving the maximum examination and treatment needs of customers.
